trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Citrix GoToMeeting | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory integration with Citrix GoToMeeting | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Citrix GoToMeeting with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Citrix GoToMeeting with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Azure
trans-unit.target: Applies To: Azure

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Citrix GoToMeeting.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Citrix GoToMeeting.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A tenant in Citrix GoToMeeting
trans-unit.target: A tenant in Citrix GoToMeeting

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Citrix GoToMeeting
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Citrix GoToMeeting

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configuration</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configuration</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Citrix GoToMeeting.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Citrix GoToMeeting.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Citrix GoToMeeting.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Citrix GoToMeeting.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Citrix GoToMeeting</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Citrix GoToMeeting</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Citrix GoToMeeting, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Citrix GoToMeeting, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Citrix GoToMeeting</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Citrix GoToMeeting</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Citrix GoToMeeting with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Citrix GoToMeeting with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a base-64 encoded certificate to your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant.
trans-unit.target: As part of this procedure, you are required to upload a base-64 encoded certificate to your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: On the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the CONFIGURE SINGLE SIGN ON dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the CONFIGURE SINGLE SIGN ON dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Enable single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Enable single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Citrix GoToMeeting page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Citrix GoToMeeting page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting page, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting page, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different browser window, log into your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant as administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different browser window, log into your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant as administrator.

trans-unit.source: Open the <linkText>Set up SAML 2.0 single sign-on configuration (SSO)</linkText><title></title> page, and then perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Open the <linkText>Set up SAML 2.0 single sign-on configuration (SSO)</linkText><title></title> page, and then perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>SAML setup</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>SAML setup</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Configure manually.
trans-unit.target: Select Configure manually.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting dialogue page, copy the Sign-Out Page URL value, and then paste it into the Sign-out page URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting dialogue page, copy the Sign-Out Page URL value, and then paste it into the Sign-out page URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting dialogue page, copy the Sign-In Page URL value, and then paste it into the Sign-in page URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Citrix GoToMeeting dialogue page, copy the Sign-In Page URL value, and then paste it into the Sign-in page URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: Create a Base-64 encoded file from your downloaded certificate.
trans-unit.target: Create a Base-64 encoded file from your downloaded certificate.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <linkText>How to convert a binary certificate into a text file</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Click Replace certificate, and then upload your base-64 encoded certificate file.
trans-unit.target: Click Replace certificate, and then upload your base-64 encoded certificate file.

trans-unit.source: Click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click Save.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to Citrix GoToMeeting.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable provisioning of Active Directory user accounts to Citrix GoToMeeting.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Configure user provisioning to open the Configure User Provisioning dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Configure user provisioning to open the Configure User Provisioning dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure user provisioning</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure user provisioning</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Citrix GotoMeeting admin user name page, type a Citrix GoToMeeting account name that has administrative rights on your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: In the Citrix GotoMeeting admin user name page, type a Citrix GoToMeeting account name that has administrative rights on your Citrix GoToMeeting tenant, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure user provisioning</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure user provisioning</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Confirmation page, click the checkmark to save your configuration.
trans-unit.target: On the Confirmation page, click the checkmark to save your configuration.

trans-unit.source: Click the validate button, to verify your configuration.
trans-unit.target: Click the validate button, to verify your configuration.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page, click Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Dropbox for Business.
trans-unit.target: You should now wait for 10 minutes and verify that the account has been synchronized to Dropbox for Business.

trans-unit.source: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking Dashboard in the D on the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page on the Azure Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: As a first verification step, you can check the provisioning status, by clicking Dashboard in the D on the Citrix GoToMeeting application integration page on the Azure Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Dashboard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Dashboard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status:
trans-unit.target: A successfully completed user provisioning cycle is indicated by a related status:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Integration status</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Integration status</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
